input_text:
Job Title: Full Stack Engineer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dealers United is seeking a Full Stack Developer to help our development team scale our growing platform.OVERVIEWWe are a digital marketing ad tech platform that's currently focused in the automotive space. We've been rapidly accelerating our production around new features and products and are seeking a talented full stack developer to help us achieve our roadmap's goals.An ideal candidate would be passionate about discovering and learning new bleeding edge technologies in our industry & platform and be able to develop a full stack application from its conception to deployment.The Full Stack Engineer role is responsible for developing intuitive and stable solutions that combine frontend and backend architecture against project and task requirements. They are ultimately responsible for the end-to-end experience of their deliverables meeting and exceeding BuyerBridge’s quality standards around code, performance and alignment with design/UX requirements.All members of the product and engineering team are expected to be comfortable living in a state of constant improvement, both individually and collectively, as we continue to build and innovate our digital marketing advertising platform. Passion towards innovation and learning is a job requirement.A self-starter with a regimented mindset around writing maintainable and intuitive code would be a perfect match for our nimble and growing team.IDEAL CANDIDATE REQUIREMENTS3+ years experience in frontend development and familiar with Vue, React or Angular3+ years experience in PHP/MySQL development and familiar with LaravelExperience working in a Agile Scrum environment on a product development teamAbility to translate interactive designs into complex, fully functional, customer interfaces with SCSSAbility to build REST APIs following existing patternsExperience with providing timed estimated deliverables and taking a project to completion when provided with scoped documentationAnd we’ll be blown away if you bring any of these things to the table:You are familiar writing your own CI/CD pipelinesYou’ve worked as a developer around the digital marketing space or, better yet, on a product team in ad techTell us you meet all the requirements above and the rest is history!
This is a full-time position open to anyone located in the US and does not require relocation. We’re a fully remote organization as a result of the pandemic and have grown with both remote and in-office employees for years so our culture is highly tuned towards remote working.
Interested? To sweeten the deal our team thinks you should know that:We have a "work from anywhere" policyYou'll have unlimited PTOWe'll cover your health, dental (base plan for employee) & vision insuranceWe'll match your 401k contributions up to 3%

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Full Stack Engineer
output_json.summary: Dealers United seeks a Full Stack Developer to scale their growing platform.
job_responsibilities: Develop intuitive and stable solutions combining frontend and backend architecture
Ensure end-to-end experience meets and exceeds quality standards
benefits: Health, dental (base plan for employee), & vision insurance
output_json.company_information: Dealers United is a digital marketing ad tech platform focused in the automotive space.
